Why Most Analysis Methods Fail The Missing Foundation

Most producers try to learn from reference tracks by ear alone. That's like trying to reverse-engineer a recipe by only tasting the final dish. Our 3-step methodology gives you the complete blueprint.

1

Harmonic Foundation

Decode chord progressions with AI-powered Roman numeral analysis. Understand the emotional and structural foundation before diving deeper.

2

Sonic Deconstruction

Our Cascade Splitter™ isolates 7 distinct components with surgical precision, revealing production techniques impossible to hear in the mix.

3

Complete Understanding

With both harmonic and sonic clarity, analyze arrangement choices, mixing techniques, and production decisions with complete context.

A top producer will analyze your track against your reference using our complete 3-step methodology

Free analysis session • See results in 15 minutes

Step 1: Harmonic Foundation AI Chord Progression Analyzer

Every great track starts with harmony. Before we can understand arrangement or production choices, we need the harmonic roadmap that guides everything else.

AI Chord Analyzer

Am - F - C - G |
Key: C Major
Chord Roman Function
Am vi Submediant
F IV Subdominant
C I Tonic
G V Dominant
AI-Powered
Roman Numeral Analysis

These Ain't Your Grandma's Chords

Most chord tools just identify individual chords. That's not enough to understand harmonic function and musical context.

Our AI Chord Analyzer uses advanced pattern recognition to identify keys, functions, and borrowed chords with professional accuracy, giving you the complete harmonic picture.

Key Detection

Advanced algorithms identify the true key center

Roman Numerals

Clear functional analysis with proper notation

Borrowed Chords

Identifies non-diatonic and chromatic harmony

MIDI Export

Professional voicings ready for your DAW

Why This Changes Everything

  • Pattern Recognition: Understands harmonic context beyond individual chords
  • Professional Voicings: Generates studio-quality MIDI with proper voice leading
  • Educational Value: Learn theory while you create with clear explanations

Step 2: Sonic Deconstruction Pulse Cascade Splitter™

With the harmonic foundation understood, we can now isolate individual elements to see exactly how they support the chord progression and create the final sound.

Cascade Splitter™

Processing

Track uploaded: "Professional_Hit.wav"

Vocals
Kick & Snare
Toms & Hats
Bass & Harmony
7-Stems
Cascading AI Models

Surgical-Precision Separation

While others give you 4 basic stems, our Cascade Splitter™ uses multiple specialized neural networks in sequence to extract 7 surgical-precision components.

Each component is processed by dedicated AI models trained for maximum separation quality, revealing production techniques impossible to hear in the full mix.

Phase-Accurate

All stems sum perfectly back to original

Multi-Model

Specialized neural networks for each component

Studio Quality

Professional-grade output with minimal artifacts

7-Component Split

Vocals, kick, snare, toms, hats, bass & harmony

What This Reveals

  • Individual Processing: See exact EQ, compression, and effects on each element
  • Spatial Design: Understand reverb sends and stereo placement techniques
  • Hidden Elements: Discover arrangement details impossible to hear in the mix
